Monthly Archives: November 2012

Free 1.0.3 – Clean and clutter-free text editor

Simple. Uncluttered. Sophisticated. Dropbox enabled. Retina-aware. “Less is more”, as minimalist architect Mies van der Rohe says. Not only is this aphorism true in architecture, it,s true in writing as well. No mess, no fuss. With All you need to write. Truly write., you don,t need to worry about the glitz and glamour of eye-candy… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, Keygen, text editor

iExplorer 3.2.0.2 – View the files on your iPhone

iExplorer (was iPhone Explorer) is an iPhone browser for Mac lets you view the files on your iOS device. By using a drag and drop interface, you can quickly copy files and folders between your Mac and your iPhone or iTouch. It works with both jailbreaked and non-jailbreaked iPhones and works quickly with a standard USB… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, File Management, iExplorer, Keygen, Serial

Egis 1.0.7 – Manage your network connection.

Egis works like Zeus, shield: it visualizes all connections established in your Mac so that you always know the sites your app is connected. If you think an app is suspicious, you can terminate it with one-click. Highlights: – List all established connections. – List all listening connections. – TCP and UDP support. – IPv4… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, Egis, K'ed, Network

JSON Toolbox 1.0.1 – JSON visualization tool for server/client developers

JSON toolbox is your all around JSON utility. It can generate code, validate json, tidy, minify and much more! FEATURES: + Automatically generate code, so that you don,t have to waste time writing it by hand. + Validates your JSON on the fly and even shows you exactly where the errors are. + Prettify/Tidy your… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, development tool, JSON Toolbox, JSON utility

ScreenFloat 1.3.2 – Create screenshots in floating windows.

ScreenFloat allows you to create screenshots which float above all other windows so that information is always readily available. ScreenFloat is the ideal choice for anyone tired of moving and resizing windows around just to access a piece of information hidden behind them. It is a great way to transfer not copy-paste-able information to another application.… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, K'ed, Productivity, ScreenFloat

Icon Creator 1.0 – ICNS and IconSet Composer

Icon Creator for Developers using Xcode to build their Mac OS X and iOS apps. Since original Icon Composer has been removed from the latest versions of Xcode, many developers are missing it. So here is the new Icon Composer, the Icon Creator. It supports OS X and iOS icons for both Regular and Retina… Read More »

Category: Featured Tags: Cracked, ICNS, Icon Creator, MAS

Apple iTunes 11.0 – Manage your music, media, iOS devices, iTunes Store, and more.

Apple iTunes lets you organize and play digital music and video on your computer. It can automatically download new music, app, and book purchases across all your devices and computers. And it,s a store that has everything you need to be entertained. Anywhere. Anytime. WHAT,S NEW Version 11.0: Completely Redesigned. iTunes makes it more fun to explore… Read More »

Billings logical workflow and intuitive interface makes time tracking and invoicing simple. Elegantly designed invoices ensure you reflect your image when it counts the most – asking for payment. With over 30 professionally designed templates for estimates, invoices, statements and envelopes, you,ll be ready to go, right away. Daylite 4.1 – Dynamic business organization tool kit

Daylite helps businesses organize themselves with tools such as shared calendars, contacts, tasks, projects, notes and more. Enable easy collaboration with features such as task and project delegation between users and never let things fall through the cracks. Create smart lists to find meaningful data fast – including delegated but uncompleted work. Work anywhere – in… Read More »

This is a modified version of a Vox 0.3 beta 1. OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion support Can not play MP3 Bug fixes Vox is a little and simple music player for Mac OS X with support for many file types, including FLAC, MP3, AAC, Musepack, Monkey,s Audio, OGG Vorbis, Apple Lossless, AIFF, WAV, IT, MOD,… Read More »

iStat Menus 4.0 – Monitor your system right from the menubar.

iStat Menus lets you monitor your system right from the menubar. Included are 8 menu extras that let you monitor every aspect of your system. Some features: CPU – Monitor cpu usage. 7 display modes, multiple core support. Memory – Monitor memory usage. 4 display modes, page ins/outs and swap usage display. Disks – Monitor disk usage and activity.… Read More »

That,s why, since 1996, tens of thousands of hobbyists, professionals and businesses depend on A Better Finder Rename to organize and maintain files. A Better Finder Rename,s user interface supports complex renaming tasks without sacrificing ease and speed of use. Simply… Read More »

Cream also works great as a lightweight companion to full-featured news readers. Use Cream when you,re short of time, and another reader for a complete scan later. WHAT,S NEW Version… Read More »

Unclutter 1.0 – Quickly and easily store all of your digital notes.

Unclutter is your instant digital pocket for storing stuff – notes, links and files, saving your Desktop from cluttering. To open your pocket, simply move the pointer to the top of screen and scroll down. Drag items from other applications to the top of screen to store them in Unclutter. Pocket 1.1.0 – Store interesting articles, videos, and webpages (was Read It Later).

Use Pocket (was Read It Later) when you discover an interesting article, video or web page, but don,t have time to go through it. Once it,s in Pocket, it,s on your computer, phone or tablet. You can read an article during a flight, see a web page while you wait in line, or watch a video while… Read More »
